message: go to your groups page and look to the right and you will see a pause button click that so it is a play button and now it is muted
The API looks as though it supports this but I can't see any way to do it in the Convore UI.
Obviously leaving the group can achieve the same thing but there is a subtle, yet important, difference.
Thanks, I was looking on the page for the single group. e.g. https://convore.com/feedback/
